remarks: Property of being a Tarski geometry - congruence part.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2019.)
statement:
istrkg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
istrkg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
istrkg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
istrkgc $p |- ( G e. TarskiGC <-> ( G e. _V /\ ( A. x e. P A. y e. P ( x .- y ) = ( y .- x ) /\ A. x e. P A. y e. P A. z e. P ( ( x .- y ) = ( z .- z ) -> x = y ) ) ) ) $.
$d .- x y z $.
$d I x y z $.
$d P x y z $.
